DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy manual syringe-infusion method hysteroscopic procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Distending Media Infusion Manual Syringe Method Hysteroscopic Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: In order minimize amount distend medium infuse hysteroscopic procedure , investigator use manual syringe method deliver distend medium hysteroscopic procedure June 2010 November 2013 institute . The aim study evaluate safety efficacy manual syringe-infusion method hysteroscopic procedure . The medical record woman receive hysteroscopic procedure manual fluid-infusion method convention pump fluid infusion method June 2010 November 2013 reviewed . In order reveal superiority/inferiority clinical outcome woman receive manual fluid infusion method , perioperative outcome compare .
DOC.criteria: Of great twentyyearold female patient suffer abnormal uterine bleeding , suspect endometrial lesion , endometrial polyp , submucous myoma . Patients hysteroscopic procedure either diagnostic therapeutic purpose June 2010 November 2013 Department Obstetrics & Gynecology Far Eastern Memorial Hospital . Female patient less twenty yearsold .
